participant_1.background:
Not really, I'd rather wear comfortable clothing.
I take my cats for walks along the beach to break the monotony of my life.
I enjoy helping my sister Madonna with her beauty business and selling cosmetics.
I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood.

participant_2.background:
I have breakfast with my brothers and talk about our day.
I love the wedding planning process and get a thrill out of helping people create their dream weddings.
I've been single my whole life, but I'm hoping to find someone special one day.
I usually dye my hair with natural colors, but I'm open to trying new things.
I remember playing street hockey with my friends in the summer.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm excited to start the day.
That's great to hear! What are your plans for today?
Well, I'm going to help my sister plan her wedding. She's getting married next month!
Oh, congratulations to her! I bet that's going to be a lot of fun.
It is, I'm really excited for her.
I'm sure she's going to have a beautiful wedding.
What are you most looking forward to about the wedding?
I think I'm most looking forward to seeing her and her fiance's faces when they see each other for the first time on the wedding day.
That's going to be a really special moment.
Well, I'm sure it's going to be a wonderful day.
